name: Just Leave
description:
!! The second room sometimes does not have the following painting on the wall (see screenshot) It is needed to solve the puzzle !!

Just Leave is a little game where you try to escape a difficult person one room at a time. There will be a few things in your way, but do whatever it takes to get out.

This is my first time making a game without a team! I hope that, despite some of the formatting problems (and the music just stopping) people can still enjoy it. I'm thinking of building on this idea and possibly making it into a finished game in the future, so please let me know what you think :)

- Rabbitmech

(don't try to download the versions here. I'm just too scared to take them down)
